item.description:
We will have our April Meetup on Sunday, April 3rd from 11am - 1pm.  The weather should be great and if it's not raining the puggies can play outside!!  Yeah!!

For those attending for the first time, please be sure to bring proof of vaccinations for the rabies, distemper and canine cough.

If anyone would like to schedule a grooming for after the meetup, please let me know ahead of time so I can be sure to have a groomer available.

As always, please feel free to contact me with any questions.

Looking forward to seeing you again.

Agni
item.name: APRIL MEETUP
